name: Crab Battle
description:
You've been stranded for days.
Luckily, you were able to knock some sticks from the trees to signal for help.

Then, they came.

One by one, it happened to your friends.
Now, those sticks are the only thing protecting you.

You're not sure how much more you can take.

  • WASD or L-stick to Move
  • Mouse or R-stick to look
  • LMB or L-trigger to use left hand
  • RMB or R-trigger to use right hand

Bonk, and TTS.

Made in a weekend for LD 50.
Some code and shaders pre-existing.

If you're having performance issues with the WebGL version (or things fall through the ground), try the Windows downloadable version.
